recommendedItems.name: Zinger® Burger Box Hot & Crispy - Regular

dname.value: Zinger® Burger Box Hot & Crispy - Regular

shortDescription.value: Burger with 2 Pieces of Hot & Crispy™ Boneless, 1 Portion of Chips, 1 Regular Potato & Gravy and 1 Regular Drink.

longDescription.value: It’s crispy, golden and delivers a pipin’ hot kick. The Hot & Crispy™ Burger box comes loaded with a Zinger Burger, 2 pieces of Hot & Crispy™ Boneless, a portion of chippies, regular Potato & Gravy AND a drink? Phew... that's one hot deal. Not everywhere and not forever.
